uk.co.crider.jablus.gui

Class DisplayParams

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.crider.jablus.gui.DisplayParams
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimulationDisplayParams, SubjectDisplayParams, SubjectDisplayParams

    public class DisplayParams
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to control general display parameters. Display parameters for specific interfaces should extend this class
